name: Diabetes, A1C
description: Goal less than 6.5, do NOT order more than every 3 months

name: Diabetes, Patient on Enalapril
description: patients with DM need renoprotection with ACEi, check Cr and urine protein

name: Diabetes, LDL
description: patients w/ DM should be on at least 20mg given daily increased risk of CAD

name: Diabetes, Last LDL Date
description: should check LDL at least yearly

name: Diabetes, Ulcers on Feet
description: Examine feet for diabetic foot ulcers at every visit to prevent risk of amputation

name: Diabetes, Last Eye Exam Date
description: Patient should have eye exam yearly
